Redbooth | Frontend, Backend, Android, Software Engineers | San Francisco | Onsite or Remote (US/Canada only) | Full-Time

https://www.redbooth.com is a collaboration platform providing tasks, chat, video, file share, and timeline. More than 3,000 organizations organize their work through Redbooth.

Tech: Ruby on Rails, MySQL, Postgres, Redis, DynamoDB, Memcached, React.js, Backbone.js

Check out the positions at https://boards.greenhouse.io/redbooth (mention HN on "How did you hear about this job?")
